items.label: Adding Knowledge Sources to the Brain Vault
Understand Nodes: The Building Blocks of Flows
Embed the Chatbot on a Website

common-tasks/conversation-design/conditi.title: Use Conditions and Logic Branching
common-tasks/conversation-design/conditi.description: Logic branching lets your assistant make decisions and follow different paths based on what the user says or does. This is how you make your assistant dynamic, smart, and able to handle real-world conversations.

common-tasks/conversation-design/underst.title: Understand Nodes: The Building Blocks of Flows
common-tasks/conversation-design/underst.description: Nodes are the fundamental building blocks of every flow in Sequence Studio. Each node performs a specific function—like sending a message, waiting for a reply, or making a decision—and by connecting them, you create powerful, interactive conversations.

common-tasks/deployment/embed-chatbot.title: Embed the Chatbot on a Website

common-tasks/integrations/crm-integratio.title: CRM Integrations: Front & Crisp
common-tasks/integrations/crm-integratio.description: Integrate BotStacks with CRM tools like Front and Crisp to power business workflows.

common-tasks/integrations/discord-integr.title: Discord Integration
common-tasks/integrations/discord-integr.description: Connect your BotStacks AI Assistant with Discord for seamless conversational experiences.

common-tasks/integrations/slack-integrat.title: Slack Integration
common-tasks/integrations/slack-integrat.description: Connect your BotStacks assistant to Slack for powerful chat automation and collaboration.

common-tasks/integrations/whatsapp-integ.title: WhatsApp Integration
common-tasks/integrations/whatsapp-integ.description: Connect BotStacks to WhatsApp for automated messaging on the world's most popular chat platform.

common-tasks/knowledge-management/add-kn.title: Adding Knowledge Sources to the Brain Vault
common-tasks/knowledge-management/add-kn.description: Learn how to populate your BotStacks Brain Vault with URLs, files, crawls, and more so your assistant stays accurate.

common-tasks/knowledge-management/previe.title: Preview Assistant Responses with BrainVault
common-tasks/knowledge-management/previe.description: Test how your assistant will answer questions using your Brain Vault knowledge sources, and fine-tune model settings for best results.

common-tasks/knowledge-management/priori.title: Organize & Prioritize Knowledge
common-tasks/knowledge-management/priori.description: Practical tips to keep your Brain Vault clean and make sure the most relevant information powers your assistant.

common-tasks/log-analytics/logs-analytic.title: Review Logs and Analytics
common-tasks/log-analytics/logs-analytic.description: BotStacks makes it easy to review logs, monitor assistant performance, and analyze every interaction with your AI bots—all from a single location in the dashboard.

common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/ana.title: Analyze and Improve Performance
common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/ana.description: Once you've tested your assistant in DIRTBox, it's time to go deeper the Tests, Transcripts, and Revisions tabs.

common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/sim.title: Simulate Conversations and Debug
common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/sim.description: Before you launch your assistant, it's crucial to simulate real conversations and debug any issues. The DIRTBox and Tests tabs make this easy.

common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/tes.title: Test Your Assistant in DIRTbox
common-tasks/testing-and-improvement/tes.description: The DIRTBox tab is your assistant's playground—a place where you can interactively test your chatbot just like a real user would. This is where you see your flows in action, catch issues early, and make sure everything works as expected before going live.

common-tasks/usage-and-costs/track-costs.title: Track Usage and LLM Costs
common-tasks/usage-and-costs/track-costs.description: Understanding and monitoring your AI token usage, assistant limits, and subscription details is essential for managing your costs and getting the most out of BotStacks.

getting-started/conceptual-overview.title: How BotStacks Works (Conceptual Overview)
getting-started/conceptual-overview.description: Learn the conceptual overview of BotStacks.

getting-started/quickstart-guide/convers.title: Design Flows in Sequence Studio
getting-started/quickstart-guide/convers.description: To build an assistant, you need to design a conversation flow.

getting-started/quickstart-guide/create-.title: Create a New Assistant
getting-started/quickstart-guide/create-.description: If you don't have a BotStacks account, you can create one on the BotStacks website.

getting-started/quickstart-guide/deploym.title: Deploy Your Assistant
getting-started/quickstart-guide/deploym.description: Now that you have tested your assistant, it's time to deploy it to your website.

getting-started/quickstart-guide/knowled.title: Add Knowledge to BrainVault
getting-started/quickstart-guide/knowled.description: After creating a BotStack (your AI assistant), you can make it smarter by adding your own data to the Brain Vault. This is where your assistant draws its knowledge to provide accurate, context-rich responses.

getting-started/quickstart-guide/testing.title: Test in DIRTbox
getting-started/quickstart-guide/testing.description: Now that you've built your assistant and added your data to the knowledge base, it's time to see how your assistant functions.

getting-started/what-is-botstacks.title: What is BotStacks?
getting-started/what-is-botstacks.description: Entry-level overview of conversational AI concepts, tools, and components.

index.title: Welcome to BotStacks Documentation
index.description: BotStacks is a powerful platform for building, deploying, and managing advanced AI assistants and automations. Whether you're a developer, designer, or product owner, this documentation will help you get the most out of BotStacks.

resources/changelog.title: Changelogs
resources/changelog.description: Discover the journey of our product's development in the Changelogs.

resources/contact-support.title: Contact Support
resources/contact-support.description: Get help from the BotStacks team or community. Reach out via email, Discord, or our Contact Us form.

resources/discord.title: Discord
resources/discord.description: Join the BotStacks Discord community for support, feature requests, bug fixes, and collaboration with other builders.

resources/tutorials.title: Video Tutorials
resources/tutorials.description: Discover our video tutorials, covering everything from beginner guides to advanced features. Whether you're just getting started or looking to level up your skills, our tutorials will help you master BotStacks and build powerful AI assistants.

tools-features/activation-kit-reference.title: Activation Kit
tools-features/activation-kit-reference.description: Full reference for all Activation Kit widget options and deployment settings in BotStacks.

tools-features/brain-vault.title: Brain Vault
tools-features/brain-vault.description: Comprehensive reference for all features, options, and best practices for Brain Vault knowledge management in BotStacks.

tools-features/dirtbox-reference.title: DIRTBox
tools-features/dirtbox-reference.description: Full reference for all DIRTBox testing, test case, and transcript features in BotStacks.

tools-features/sequence-studio/best-prac.title: Best Practices
tools-features/sequence-studio/best-prac.description: Tips and strategies for designing, testing, and maintaining flows in Sequence Studio.

tools-features/sequence-studio/design-fe.title: Design Features
tools-features/sequence-studio/design-fe.description: Visual builder features, canvas, node settings, preview, and flow design tools in Sequence Studio.

tools-features/sequence-studio/faq.title: FAQ
tools-features/sequence-studio/faq.description: Frequently asked questions about Sequence Studio, flows, and nodes.

tools-features/sequence-studio/node-refe.title: Node Reference
tools-features/sequence-studio/node-refe.description: Full technical reference for all core nodes in Sequence Studio.

tools-features/sequence-studio/overview.title: Overview
tools-features/sequence-studio/overview.description: Introduction to Sequence Studio, flows, nodes, and the visual builder in BotStacks.

tools-features/sequence-studio/panels.title: Panels
tools-features/sequence-studio/panels.description: Reference for panels: Variables, Brain Vault, Revisions, and Intents in Sequence Studio.
